alert.note: Alert for Annette Island; Ketchikan Gateway Borough; Prince of Wales Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued November 07 at 6:50AM AKST until November 09 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Southeast winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Prince of Wales Island, Ketchikan Gateway Borough and Annette Island. * WHEN...From Wednesday afternoon through Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Annette Island; Ketchikan Gateway Borough; Prince of Wales Island
